one_reviews_text: We first tried Ollie when it was in alpha/beta mode and knew it would be a great creator-friendly tool immediately. Our students, K-12 and college-level, have used this tool and love that they could quickly prototype scenes or 3D object layout ideas using this platform. I highly recommend it and especially because the team behind it is amazing and truly trying to change how people create with VR!

2 stars really?  This is a great freaking start!  My hat off to you guys!  I know this wasn't easy to create and it's free!  People are so ridiculous!  Just because they don't know how to use something they leave a bad review?  Really?  This is great for animation and it will only get better!  If you are a pro animator or just starting this is easy as cake!  I mean come on folks, it's freaking free!  Give them a break!
you cant draw the thing you want,it predicts your movement(a bad thing in animation), most of the buttons dont work,its just bad, barely two stars

review_title: Makes animating in VR so much fun!
one_reviews_text: Explaining keyframes and animation concepts to beginners is tedious and can get confusing but this app makes it so easy! I showed it 5 year old family friend and he loved it. He had never animated before but picked it up super quickly and had such a blast. I practically had to yank the headset off of his head! Great work to the developers!
